value.title: Robotics Deliver Goods Beyond The Supply Chain
value.excerpt: Robots are popping up everywhere: delivering, unloading, cooking and even farming, but we’re likely a few years away from affordable in-home applications.

value.title: Robotics & Artificial Intelligence ETF (BOTZ) at 52-Week High
value.excerpt: For investors looking for momentum, Global X Robotics & Artificial Intelligence ETF BOTZ is probably a suitable pick. The fund just hit a 52-week high and is up 99.4% from its 52-week low price of $18.

value.title: Coded Bias: An Insightful Look At AI, Algorithms And Their Risks To Society
value.excerpt: Coded Bias is Netflix’s deepest dive yet into the state of artificial intelligence, and the issues it confronts are uncomfortably relevant.

value.title: Robot Truck Startup TuSimple Raises $1 Billion In First Self-Driving Startup IPO
value.excerpt: The San Diego-based developer of robotic truck technology is the first self-driving tech company to go public in the U.S.–and did so via a conventional IPO.

value.title: Walmart invests in self-driving startup Cruise
value.excerpt: Walmart is investing in self-driving startup Cruise as part of a massive $2.75 billion investment round in the company—an expansion of the $2 billion round announced in January. That original announcement featured three other big names: GM,

value.title: Baubot comes out with two new robots to aid in construction projects

value.title: Tecton teams with founder of Feast open source machine learning feature store
value.excerpt: Tecton, the company that pioneered the notion of the machine learning feature store, has teamed up with the founder of the open source feature store project called Feast. Today the company announced the release of version 0.

value.title: User experience testing and monitoring startup UserZoom raises $100M
value.excerpt: The proceeds, which the company says it plans to put toward expansion and hiring, come as UserZoom acquires EnjoyHQ, an experience insights startup that centralizes customer feedback and research findings into a single dashboard.

value.title: Fears of vaccine exclusion as India uses digital ID, facial recognition
value.excerpt: (Thomson Reuters Foundation) - Millions of vulnerable people are at risk of missing out on COVID-19 vaccines as India uses its national digital identity for registration and pilots facial recognition technology at inoculation centres, rights groups and ...

value.title: Cruise's head of artificial intelligence wants the autonomous-car startup to be defined by its AI innovation
value.excerpt: Hussein Mehanna thinks machine learning is going to set Cruise apart, and he told Insider how companies could become "AI natives" in the future.

value.title: How Keystonemab is using Watson to revolutionize drug discovery
value.excerpt: Tushar Satav was about to supplement his career in pharmaceutical research with an MBA in data analytics when he was diagnosed with a massive brain tumor. Using his relevant experience, he began to research every available treatment option for the relatively rare type of brain tumor, a vestibular schwannoma.

value.title: AWS launches free digital training courses to empower business leaders with ML knowledge

value.title: Latana Uses Machine Learning to Help Retailers Track Their Marketing’s Impact
value.excerpt: Latana offers AI-powered brand tracking designed to help retailers make better marketing decisions with scalable insights. The solution provider’s machine learning technology can accurately track retailers’ brands to provides deep audience segmentation.

value.title: Life Inside The Self-Optimizing AI Automated Company
value.excerpt: Business is becoming increasingly automated. Not just in terms of software chatbots designed to deal with customer queries online, but at a lower substrate level where the real operational mechanics of the business happen on a day-to-day basis.

value.title: IBM acquires business process automation startup MyInvenio
value.excerpt: IBM has acquired MyInvenio, an enterprise process automation startup based in Reggio Emilia, Italy, for an undisclosed sum.

value.title: AI's social justice problem: It can amplify human bias
value.excerpt: Coded Bias director Shalini Kantayya talked to CNET about the algorithms that are making life's most important decisions for us.

value.title: California Dreaming: Artificial intelligence and robots are helping farmers prepare for climate change crisis
value.excerpt: Rising temperatures caused by climate change are forcing farmers to look for ways to grow crops. Some are using artificial intelligence and robots to analyze crops while others are taking their farms indoors.

value.title: Today In B2B: The Pains of eMarketplace AR; Hatch Launches SMB Neobanking Services
value.excerpt: Today in B2B payments, UpstartWorks talks eMarketplace AR, Hatch launches neobanking services for SMBs and Kofax upgrades its AP offering.

value.title: Tesla next-gen ‘Full Self-Driving’ is delayed to May-June, subscription coming next month
value.excerpt: Tesla is currently testing the “feature complete” version of its Full Self-Driving (FSD) package in beta with a few thousand customers and employees through its early access program.

value.title: N.Y.P.D.’s Robot Dog Returns to Work, Touching Off a Backlash
value.excerpt: Deployed at a public housing building, the device drew condemnation as a stark example of police power and misplaced priorities.
